detailsData.title: Experience
detailsData.content: Several of our attorneys have worked as former prosecutors and each has over 20 years of trial experience. We know what it takes to succeed and will take your case to court if that is the best option for you.

detailsData.title: Integrity
detailsData.content: When our firm accepts your case, it is because we wholeheartedly believe in the merits of it. We give each client our immediate and undivided attention.

detailsData.title: Communication
detailsData.content: We offer our clients the convenience of virtual case management from the initial consultation through the settlement or verdict of their case. This includes text, e-signing, and emailing.

detailsData.title: Tenacity
detailsData.content: We thoroughly prepare each claim as if it will go to court, use every resource necessary to tell your side of the story, and build the most compelling case for you.

valueProp: Fuicelli & Lee is a personal injury law firm dedicated to representing clients across Colorado who have suffered catastrophic injuries due to someone’s reckless or careless actions. Our founding partner, Keith Fuicelli, is a brain injury survivor who understands firsthand the lasting impact a serious injury can have on the lives of victims and their families. As a firm, we strive to obtain full, fair, and complete compensation for every client, every time.

testimonalData.text: Keith and his team are LIFESAVERS! I was set up with a different lawyer by my doctor after I was rear ended by a cab. This lawyer was from a larger firm and it was nearly impossible to speak with him directly – and the assistants were never able to give me an update about my case.
testimonalData.author: ALLIE B.

testimonalData.text: Katherine Polley was pivotal in giving me constant feedback whenever I had questions about my case in a timely manner, she was friendly, courteous, and highly professional. Fuicelli and Lee took me in when several other attorneys were highly negative towards my complicated situation.
testimonalData.author: JAMES

testimonalData.text: What a pleasure it is to tell you about Lori Tolle, Esq. with Fuicelli & Lee. An experienced negotiator and strategist, Lori handled my injury case with skill, persistence and compassion. She displayed the highest levels of integrity and professionalism. Despite all the obstacles my case presented.
testimonalData.author: D. CHAMPDELAINE
